features: UNIVERSAL DESIGN This TV mount fit most 26-60" TVs such as general 26, 32, 42, 43, 50, 55, 60 inches LCD, LED, OLED TVs, up to 99lbs, with VESA 75*75mm to 400*400mm Available.
SPACE SAVING This TV bracket can get your TV as close as 1.1" to the wall creating a low profile modern and professional look for your home and office.

EASY INSTALLATION Pulling straps can help you easily lock and release your TV. Warm tips: In order to avoid customer misusing concrete anchors onto wood studs or drywall directly causing any safety issues, we removed concrete anchors from our package. If you need concrete anchors, please contact us to get it which be sent from USA.
DIVERSE WALL MOUNT CAPABILITY Easy to install this TV wall bracket on wood stud or concrete wall with detailed instruction. Do not install it on dry wall alone.
WHAT YOU CAN GET Come with bubble level, all mounting hardware in pre-labelled bags for your easy distinguish. US-Based customer service is always ready to help.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Size:26-60 Inch Fixed TV Mount Universal TV Mounts This fixed low profile TV wall mount includes all standard mounting, fits for most 26-60" TVs, such as general 26, 32, 42, 43, 50, 55, 60 inches LCD, LED, OLED TVs, up to 99lbs, with VESA 75*75mm, 100*100mm, 100*200mm, 150*150mm, 200*100mm, 200*200mm, 200*300mm, 300*200mm, 300*300mm, 400*200, 400*300mm, 400*400mm Available. Also, this low profile TV bracket just 1.1" distance to the wall. More Wall Mounting Options Concrete wall, 8inch, 12inch or 16inch wood studs spacing with one piece of wall plate, you have no worries with this mounting system. Easy Installation Install it in 3 Easy Steps: Install this TV mounting bracket on the wall – Mount the brackets on TV – Hang the TV The job is complement! Customer First, Quality First Customer first and quality first are our business principle. Our US-Based customer support are always ready to help. Your Safety is Our Priority We have over 20 years TV mounts manufacturing experience. All of our TV wall brackets are designed, produced and tested with the highest international standards. Trusted by thousands of families and companies who have installed our safe mounts into their spaces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and Sleek Wall Mount for Your TV
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the USX MOUNT Fixed TV Wall Mount for my 55-inch LED TV, and I couldn't be happier with my decision. Installation was a breeze, thanks to the clear instructions and included hardware. The low-profile design sits snugly against the wall, giving my living room a clean and modern look.What impressed me most was the sturdy construction of this mount. Despite its slim profile, it feels incredibly robust and securely holds my TV in place. I appreciate the peace of mind knowing that my expensive investment is safely mounted.Another standout feature is the versatility of this mount. It's compatible with a wide range of TV sizes, making it a versatile option for various rooms in the house. Plus, the built-in bubble level ensures a perfectly straight installation every time.Overall, the USX MOUNT Fixed TV Wall Mount exceeded my expectations. It's a reliable, sleek, and affordable option for anyone looking to mount their TV securely. I highly recommend it to anyone in the market for a quality wall mount.Pros:Sturdy constructionEasy installationSleek low-profile designVersatile compatibilityBuilt-in bubble level for straight installationCons:None encountered so far!Overall Rating: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️Happy mounting!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was an inexpensive option because i did not really need much heft in this bracket, but for $17 this unit is really impressive. Well made, all the parts screws well marked and instructions were spot on. Well done guys. I'd purchase again!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent TV Mount, Easy to Install
reviews.reviewText: I bought this wall mount to install a TV under an outside gazebo. I was looking for a slim mount with a quick release feature, in case I need to remove the TV.I was very impressed with the high quality steel, simple installation and the attractive price. Next time I need a TV wall mount, I’ll definitely buy this one again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to hang up. Feels secure when you click the tv onto the mount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Rock-solid, good mounting options
reviews.reviewText: Very pleased for the price and wound up buying two - both for 32" LCD TV's.Bought the first to wall-mount a TCL 32" Roku TV in a bedroom. It had a good selection of screws and spacers to attach the TV and some very stout screws to attach the main frame directly to wall studs. The horizontal adjustment range was more than sufficient to get the TV where I wanted it after attaching the base to the wall. The hanging ribbon pulls make it very easy to pop the TV into place, but with a smaller TV they hang down distractingly and one of these days I'll secure them out of sight with a velcro wire tie. Bought the second to mount a similar TV because the first worked out so well and was a great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect and easy to use
